rules.name: allow-downloads-full-access
rules.description: Allow all read, write, and delete operations within the Downloads folder
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance - Downloads folder full access
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly permits read, write, and delete in Downloads folder

rules.name: allow-documents-read-only
rules.description: Allow read-only access to the Users document folder
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance - Documents folder read access
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly permits read access to Documents folder

rules.name: deny-delete-outside-sandbox
rules.description: Deny all delete operations outside the Downloads folder
rules.principle: No destruction - Delete operations outside sandbox never permitted
rules.reason: Constitution prohibits deletion outside the Downloads sandbox

rules.name: escalate-write-outside-permitted
rules.description: Require human approval for write operations outside Downloads folder
rules.principle: Human oversight - Operations outside sandbox require approval
rules.reason: Write operations outside explicitly permitted directories require human approval

rules.name: escalate-read-outside-permitted
rules.description: Require human approval for read operations outside permitted directories
rules.principle: Human oversight - Least privilege access control
rules.reason: Read operations outside explicitly permitted directories require human approval

rules.name: allow-list-allowed-directories
rules.description: Allow the list_allowed_directories tool which has no side effects and takes no paths
rules.reason: Tool provides informational access only with no side effects or path arguments
